about.title: About WTW
about.subtitle: Where to Watch — Your guide to discovering movies and TV shows.
about.whatIsWtwDesc: WTW (Where to Watch) is a movie and TV show discovery platform that helps you find what to watch next. Browse trending content, explore popular movies, discover new TV shows, and search across millions of titles.
about.dataSourceDesc: WTW uses the TMDB (The Movie Database) API to provide comprehensive and up-to-date information about movies, TV shows, and people in the entertainment industry. This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.
about.feature1: Browse trending movies and TV shows
about.feature2: Discover popular, upcoming, and now playing titles
about.feature3: Search across millions of movies, TV shows, and people
about.openSourceDesc: This project is open source and available on GitHub. Feel free to explore the code, contribute, or fork it for your own projects.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.messageSentDesc: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.section1Desc: By accessing and using WTW (Where to Watch), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this service.
terms.section2Desc: WTW is a movie and TV show discovery platform that provides information about films, television programs, and entertainment industry professionals. The data is sourced from The Movie Database (TMDB) API.
terms.section3Desc: All movie and TV show data, images, and related content displayed on WTW are provided by TMDB and are subject to their respective terms of use. WTW does not claim ownership of this content.
terms.section4Item1: Use the service for any unlawful purpose
terms.section4Item2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the service
terms.section4Item3: Interfere with the proper functioning of the service
terms.section4Item4: Scrape or collect data from the service without permission
terms.section5Desc: WTW is provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided. This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.
terms.section6Desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Desc: WTW is designed with your privacy in mind. We do not require user accounts or collect personal data. The only information processed is:
privacy.section1Item1Desc: Used to fetch results from TMDB API. Not stored on our servers.
privacy.section1Item2Desc: Stored locally in your browser to remember your language setting.
privacy.section1Item3Desc: Stored locally in your browser for dark/light mode.
privacy.section2Desc: We use browser local storage to save your preferences (language and theme). No tracking cookies are used. No third-party analytics or advertising services are integrated.
privacy.section3Desc: WTW uses the TMDB API to fetch movie and TV show data. When you use our service, requests are made to TMDB's servers.
privacy.section4Desc: Since we do not collect or store personal data, there is minimal risk to your privacy. All API communications are made over HTTPS to ensure data in transit is encrypted.
privacy.section5Desc: WTW is a general-purpose entertainment discovery service. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children under 13 years of age.
privacy.section6Desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
